thread.title: When Shah Rukh Khan nearly refused 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge'
thread.title_full: When Shah Rukh Khan nearly refused 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: When Shah Rukh Khan nearly refused 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge'
text:
With arms wide open, Shah Rukh Khan redefined romance as Raj in "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge", but the superstar says he nearly refused the film as he found the role too "girlish".
Shah Rukh revealed this in the "Making of DDLJ" documentary, released to mark 20th anniversary of the film.*Shah Rukh Khan*
Directed by Aditya ... Â»
